comment.author: 33593953@N02
comment._content: Thanks for pointing out the relationship! I enjoyed reading the comments under your image about dating the image--as you suggest, it can be tricky. There's some information about the photochrom process and some clues about dating images made with this process on this page of our information about the photochrom prints: www.loc.gov/pictures/collection/pgz/process.html
